title: How to Start a T-Shirt Business for Beginners
headline: Learn how to sell t-shirts on various print-on-demand platforms without any upfront costs in this free online course.
description: Forget about expensive business models that require thousands of dollars to get started. With this business, there are no startup costs, no inventory to store and no products to ship! This course will teach you to leverage various online sales channels to build and grow your business. While you focus all your attention on creating t-shirt designs, you can leave the printing, shipping, marketing and even customer service to the marketplace.

courseDescription:
This free online e-commerce course will guide you to start your online t-shirt business by using different print-on-demand platforms such as Merch by Amazon, Teespring and Redbubble including everything involved in creating accounts and uploading designs and necessary information. The first topic of this e-commerce course offers an introduction to the online t-shirt business and gives basic information such as creating your profiles and uploading your designs on the print-on-demand platforms that you will use for your business. These platforms will produce t-shirts with your designs on, ship the products to customers, handle payments and manage customer care and you will get a commission for each item sold. You will learn how to hire professionals to create t-shirt designs from various freelancing platforms such as Fiverr and Upwork. Copyright infringement is the use of works protected by copyright law without permission for usage, and since freelancing services can be tricky with an ever-present possibility of copyright violation, you will be taught how to select a designer for your designs with the certainty that the designer is trusted and offers services at a reasonable price.

If you need to start building your brand’s visual identity and hiring a designer isn’t an option for you, you will be taught how to create your own design to bring down the cost of your business and maximize your profit. What are the steps involved in creating a simple design? To answer this question, you will be shown how to download a free photo editor, find high-quality royalty-free images online and use design templates to complete your t-shirt designs. In order to succeed in the t-shirt business, you need to know your niche in your target market and what t-shirt designs they want and you will learn how to conduct market research to find your niche. Next you’ll learn all about trends and customer demand using Google Trends, Amazon and social media, including keywords, SEO and trademark along with free and paid online marketing strategies to grow your business.

It’s also important to keep an eye on competitors and by doing a competitor analysis and this can be done by researching their digital marketing strategies, content, keywords and the practices they employ to keep themselves relevant. All this and more is explained in detail, but also in an easy-to-understand, practical way that you can apply from the get-go. You do not have to be a designer to enrol in this course and start applying the strategies provided. The online t-shirt business is a booming industry with a wide range of customers all around the globe and this course will help anyone looking for an ideal way to innovate their brand from a traditional brick-and-mortar store into a well-loved brand that offers great t-shirt designs and products, 24 hours a day.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to creating and purchasing t-shirt designs and conducting market research for your business. You will be guided to use freelancing websites to get your designs. At the end of this module, you will be taught how to conduct online research using Google Trends, Amazon and social media to boost your business.
topics: Design and Market Research - Learning Outcomes
Design and Market Research - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to Merch by Amazon, Teespring, Redbubble etc for selling your t-shirt designs online. You will learn how to use website design tools and a free photo editor GIMP to create your t-shirt designs. You will gain an understanding of different marketing strategies, both free and paid, to expand your business.
topics: Online Selling and Marketing Strategies - Learning Outcomes
Creating and Selling Designs on Merch by Amazon
Creating and Selling Designs on Teespring
Creating and Selling Designs on Redbubble
Online Selling and Marketing Strategies - Lesson Summary

    • Compare various freelancing websites for your t-shirt designs.
    • Identify quality designers from freelancing websites.

    • Outline sources for royalty-free images for your designs.
    • Identify various sources for market research for your business.
    • Select key areas for your market research.
    • List important keywords for your online shop.

  • Lesson Summary

  • The main points from this module are:
    • Print-on-demand marketplaces print your t-shirt designs, ship them to customers, handle payments and manage customer care.
    • Freelancers can be hired to create their t-shirt designs and upload them on different platforms.
    • Create your own designs easily and quickly by using GIMP, a free and open-source photo editor.
    • Download royalty-free images for your designs from Pixabay and other websites.
    • Obtain fancy and vibrant texts from the CoolText graphic generator for their t-shirt designs.
    • Users can access completed designs by becoming a member of a platform.
    • Market research can be conducted by employing various online platforms such as Google Trends, Amazon and social media.
    • Google Trends allows you to compare various trends on the same chart.
    • Each item on Amazon has a seller rating that indicates how quickly an item is selling.
    • Users can follow celebrities on social media to find about what is trending in the fashion industry.
    • Market research focuses on keyword research, SEO research and trademark research.

  • Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Identify various print-on-demand platforms such as Merch by Amazon, Teespring and Redbubble for your t-shirt business.
    • Explain the process of creating accounts on online sales channels and filling out the required information.
    • Describe the process of creating online campaigns and promotions.
    • Describe the tier system on Merch by Amazon for seller rankings.
    • List ways to optimize your product listings on Teespring.
    • Identify marketplace integrations on Teespring.
    • Outline the steps required for conversion tracking through Google and Facebook.

  • Lesson Summary

  • The main points from this module are:
    • Print-on-demand platforms require users to upload their designs while printing, shipping and payments are handled by the platforms.
    • For each item sold, the users receive a commission from the print-on-demand platforms.
    • Placeit.net offers a design maker for t-shirts and users can access more than 5,000 design templates.
    • Canva.com offers a t-shirt design tool on its website that is easy to use with a variety of design options.
    • Merch by Amazon is a popular print-on-demand platform that requires an invitation to join.
    • Merch by Amazon uses a tier system to rank the sellers. A higher rank on the system suggests more items can be sold by the seller.
    • Teespring offers print-on-demand services and offers conversion tracking through Google and Facebook.
    • Teespring offers an analytics tool to calculate the number of visitors, purchases made during a campaign and estimated profit.
    • Redbubble is another print-on-demand platform that offers similar services.
